= Overview =

The Notification Component provides a low coupling medium for the the controller layer to pass information to the user interface. It also allow the lower facade layer to pass information to the Main Core layer.

= Classes =

The main important class for Notification is the *NotificationQueue* and *INotificationQueue*. Many notification is implemented in both UI and SLL layer. For user interface developer, the developer need to implement watcher to watch all the notification belonging to the Notification.UINotification namespace.

= Description of Design =

The notification layer make used observer pattern to notify its watcher to resume their thread if new notification is added to the queue. 

= Extending Notification =

To extend more notification, developer will have to add more enum to *NotificationCode* and extend from the *AbstractNotification* object.
